property.name: Rules
property.value: [Click]: Host Bishop on a piece of ice not hosting a Caissa. If already hosted, Bishop can be hosted only on ice protecting a central server if Bishop is on ice protecting a remote server, or on ice protecting a remote server if Bishop is on ice protecting a central server. Host ice has -2 strength.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scheherazade can host any number of programs. Whenever you install a program on Scheherazade, gain 1 [Credits].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Installing 1001 programs puts you in the hacker hall of fame, or would if such an institution actually existed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your turn begins, gain 2 [Credits] and lose [Click].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Noise decided to go back to school. He applied for research grants at fifteen of the most prestigious universities. Then he hacked in and approved his applications. Breakfast time.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run. You may jack out when you encounter the first piece of ice.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Just like in the real world, sometimes it is best to send in the clone to do the dirty work.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you pass a piece of ice, you may trash Copycat. If you do, choose another rezzed copy of that piece of ice protecting any server. The run continues as if you had just passed the chosen piece of ice (you are now running from this new position).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The copycat function should be used with extreme caution, or you might end up on the wrong side of cyberspace.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 3 [Credits]: Break up to 3 code gate subroutines. 3 [Credits]: +5 strength.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's efficient as all hell, for certain very large values of "efficient." The whale avatar is either a nice touch or a tragic misapplication of programmer man-hours, depending on who you ask. -BT's Guide to Icebreaking

property.name: Instructions
property.value: 3 [Credits]: Break up to 3 code gate subroutines.||3 [Credits]: +5 strength

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to play this event, spend [Click]. Reveal the top card of your stack. You may install that card, lowering the install cost by 1 [Credits], if able; otherwise, trash it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've got a surprise for you."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you make a successful run on Archives, instead of accessing cards, you may choose 1 faceup card in Archives and add it to the top of R&D.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why is data deleted? Maybe they don't want it to be found. Or maybe it's just useless. The useless data is the kind you want." -The Professor

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1 [Recurring Credits] Use this credit to play events.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A VoicePAD is a personal access device with most of its functions ripped out. Just about all it's good for is making voice-calls and managing your contacts. The only reason to even have one is for its anonymity, which for a certain kind of person is all the reason one needs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Subroutine] End the run unless the Runner spends [Click] [Click]. [Subroutine] End the run unless the Runner pays 3 [Credits]. [Subroutine] End the run unless the Runner trashes 1 installed program. [Subroutine] End the run unless the Runner takes 1 brain damage.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Black Ops

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if the Runner installed a resource during his or her last turn. Trace2 - If successful, add 1 installed resource to the top of the Runner's stack. If unsuccessful, take 1 bad publicity.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you score Clone Retirement, you may remove 1 bad publicity. When the Runner steals Clone Retirement, the Corp takes 1 bad publicity.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They call it 'retirement.' I call it euthanasia.' " -Ken "Express" Tenma

property.name: Rules
property.value: The Runner cannot use AI programs to break subroutines on Swordsman. [Subroutine] Trash 1 AI program. [Subroutine] Do 1 net damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Writing a program that can pass the Turing test is easy. The Gibson-Akamatsu test is a higher bar, and the only AIs to clear it thus far have been the androids. Even some humans have been known to fail.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: [Subroutine] Trash 1 AI Program.||[Subroutine] Inflict 1 Net Damage

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [Click]. Place up to 2 advancement tokens on a card that can be advanced.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He signed for it, hand shaking in anticipation.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you rez Muckraker, take 1 bad publicity. [Subroutine] Trace1 - If successful, give the Runner 1 tag. [Subroutine] Trace2 - If successful, give the Runner 1 tag. [Subroutine] Trace3 - If successful, give the Runner 1 tag. [Subroutine] End the run if the Runner is tagged.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: [Subroutine] Trace 1. If successful, give the Runner 1 Tag.||[Subroutine] Trace 2. If successful, give the Runner 1 Tag.||[Subroutine] Trace 3. If successful, give the Runner 1 Tag.||End the Run if the runner is tagged

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you do meat damage, do 1 additional meat damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I use bioroids because I can wipe their memories or just blow their brains out when the job is done. No witnesses means no witnesses."

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you rez Elizabeth Mills, remove 1 bad publicity. [Click], [Trash]: Trash 1 location. Take 1 bad publicity.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's not personal. Urban renewal is a necessity of the modern world. It's always someone's home, yours is no different."

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Install only in a remote server. The Runner cannot initiate a run on this server. Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on HQ, trash Off the Grid.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you score Profiteering, take up to 3 bad publicity. Gain 5 [Credits] for each bad publicity taken.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It was surprisingly easy to make creds...if you didn't care about how you made them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain 15 [Credits].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are many names for those in the Administration Department. But if you like your job, you just refer to them as "sir" and "ma'am."
